WARNINGS.NO_PARTICIPANTS_AND_TRANSMITTERS: There are currently no transmission to, or participants in the conference.
WARNINGS.PARTICIPANTS_BUT_NO_TRANSMITTER_TITLE: No sound is being transmitted to the participants!
WARNINGS.PARTICIPANTS_BUT_NO_TRANSMITTER_TEXT1: To transmit audio, dial the number {phoneNumber} with your SIP-application(fx. X-lite). Do not call the 8-digit number - it is only for the participants!
WARNINGS.PARTICIPANTS_BUT_NO_TRANSMITTER_TEXT2: If the meeting is over, press next to each participant, so they do not pay unnecessarily!
WARNINGS.PARTICIPANTS_BUT_NO_TRANSMITTER_TEXT3: If X-Lite does not want to call, then press Exit in the X-Lite and start it again.

INFO.NO_HOST: There is currently no transmission from the Kingdom Hall.
